Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add parental guide section to film details page

Adds a new API route and UI section showing IMDb parental guide severity
ratings \(sex/nudity, violence, profanity, etc.\) with color-coded pills
on the movie detail page, sourced from the parental_guide_cache table.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add reviews and rename Info tab to Details

Add the ability to write/edit text reviews alongside star ratings on the
film detail page. Reviews are displayed in both mobile and desktop rating
cards, and other members'' reviews are shown in the Ratings tab. Rename
the "Info" tab to "Details" for clarity.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: give discussion chat a bounded height so scroll works on mobile

The ChatThread''s messages container needs a fixed-height parent to create
an independent scroll context. Without it, scrollToBottom\(\) has no effect
because the container isn''t actually scrollable. Set the wrapper to
calc\(100vh - header - tabs\) and add a keyboard-open scroll trigger.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
